name: The Cage
description: This is a thriller theme pixel painting style puzzle solving role-playing games. The game tells the story of the day when the protagonist's mother died.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7及以上 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 High Color + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
